ValidationRule.description: Ensures that if an Opportunity has a Swedish owner and the Contract Category is set to “Change to an active call off or contract” the New or Renewal field must be set to “Renewal.”
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Permission.Bypass_validation_rule = FALSE, ISPICKVAL(Contract_Category__c, "Change to an active call off or contract"), ISPICKVAL(New_or_Renewal__c, "New"), Owner.Country = "Sweden" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This Opportunity has a Swedish owner. If Contract Category is “Change to an active call off or contract” you must set New or Renewal to “Renewal.”
